01-the-first-assignment-of-works.title: The first assignment of works
01-the-first-assignment-of-works.intro: We started talking about working on the project. Everyone was in a positive mood and work topics were given to everybody without a problem.

02-logistics-scheme.title: Logistics scheme
02-logistics-scheme.intro: We have now worked on the principles of logistics together with students from both schools.

03-database.title: We are creating the database of ELIS
03-database.intro: On our second meeting, we discussed the functionality of our database and reviewed it with our polish co-workers.

04-app-architecture.title: We design the basic architecture of the web application
04-app-architecture.intro: We decided for OOP (Object-oriented programming), ORM (Object–relational mapping), MVP (Model–view–controller).

05-logo.title: We design the project logo
05-logo.intro: In order to create a website and other promotional materials, we design a project logo.

06-web-presentation.title: Web presentation
06-web-presentation.intro: We create a web presentation so that we can present the project and document it on an ongoing basis.

07-app-update-0-1-3.title: Web application update 0.1.3
07-app-update-0-1-3.intro: We did a lot of work on web application. We have added an interface for dispatchers and drivers.

08-app-update-0-2-0.title: Web application update 0.2.0
08-app-update-0-2-0.intro: In this update, we've done a lot around managing packages and routes.

09-2021-06-21.title: CZ Visit - The first day
09-2021-06-21.intro: The first day of the project started with the polish team arriving at 3pm to Varnsdorf.

10-2021-06-22.title: CZ  Visit - Noprosu, Kocour, Workshop
10-2021-06-22.intro: In the morning at 9:00 went on our way to logistics firm NOPROSU, where they showed us everything about logistics and truck transport, which was very interesting and educative.

11-2021-06-23.title: CZ Visit - Trip to Prague
11-2021-06-23.intro: During wednesday we've gone to Prague..

12-2021-06-24.title: CZ  Visit - Haas and Sohn, Workshop, Bowling
12-2021-06-24.intro: In the morning we visited a logistic company Haas and Sohn in Varnsdorf that makes and delivers stoves.

13-2021-06-25.title: CZ Visit - Saying our goodbyes
13-2021-06-25.intro: In the morning we visited a logistic company Haas and Sohn in Varnsdorf that makes and delivers stoves.

15-app-update-0-2-4.title: Web application update 0.2.4
15-app-update-0-2-4.intro: We've improved the look of the tables and added basic driver statistics.
